name: SEEK (itch) (Georgina)
description:
Seek is an indie action game inspired from Sekiro: Shadows die twice as well as the Dark souls series. Seek includes familiar elements such as demon/monster-slaying, a dark fantasy world created in the style of feudal Japan with a combat system based on timing, position and skill combinations. 

In Seek you play as a ‘ninja samurai’, seeking for the power of the ancient one. A rumour says that the power was sealed on the island long ago and to gain the power the player follows the rumour to the island where the journey begins. Desperate to obtain the powers the player must defeat Gohal-Red oni, Tadakatsu and Urashima. Each with a unique combat mechanism, a perilous quest awaits the player. The play has 5 main skills to access in the beginning being Dash attack, Crazy attack, Heavy attack, Z dash and Teleport. 3 more powers are obtained as the player defeats each of the 3 different bosses being fire attack, thunder attack and poison attack.  Unique quests, character, environment, skills and more.

Download Link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1XkXLjX2G0G3A_PiVslssBqmkGme2gnru
